name: gps-design-systems-lwc
description: LWC implementations of a collection of Public Sector Design Systems

scripts.prep-sggov: cp -a node_modules/@govtechsg/sgds/css/sgds.css sfGpsDsSgGov/main/default/staticresources/sfGpsDsSgGov; mkdir -p sfGpsDsSgGov/main/default/staticresources/sfGpsDsSgGov; cp -a node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css sfGpsDsSgGov/main/default/staticresources/sfGpsDsSgGov; mkdir -p sfGpsDsSgGov/main/default/staticresources/sfGpsDsSgGov/fonts; cp -a node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts/* sfGpsDsSgGov/main/default/staticresources/sfGpsDsSgGov/fonts; mkdir -p sfGpsDsSgGovFull
scripts.prep: npm run prep-nsw; npm run prep-nsws; npm run prep-qld; npm run prep-vic; npm run prep-vic2; npm run prep-frgov; npm run prep-ukgov;npm run prep-sggov
scripts.aunsw-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsAuNswFull;mkdir -p sfGpsDsAuNswFull;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsAuNswFull;cp -a sfGpsDsAuNsw/. sfGpsDsAuNswFull
scripts.aunsws-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsAuNswSFull;mkdir -p sfGpsDsAuNswSFull;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsAuNswSFull;cp -a sfGpsDsAuNswS/. sfGpsDsAuNswSFull
scripts.auqld-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsAuQldFull;mkdir -p sfGpsDsAuQldFull;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsAuQldFull;cp -a sfGpsDsAuQld/. sfGpsDsAuQldFull
scripts.auvic1-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsAuVic1Full;mkdir -p sfGpsDsAuVic1Full;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsAuVic1Full;cp -a sfGpsDsAuVic/. sfGpsDsAuVic1Full
scripts.auvic2-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsAuVic2Full;mkdir -p sfGpsDsAuVic2Full;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsAuVic2Full;cp -a sfGpsDsAuVic2/. sfGpsDsAuVic2Full
scripts.frgov-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsFrGovFull;mkdir -p sfGpsDsFrGovFull;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsFrGovFull;cp -a sfGpsDsFrGov/. sfGpsDsFrGovFull
scripts.ukgov-copy: rm -rf sfGpsDsUkGovFull;mkdir -p sfGpsDsUkGovFull;cp -a sfGpsDs/. sfGpsDsUkGovFull;cp -a sfGpsDsUkGov/. sfGpsDsUkGovFull

author: Emmanuel Schweitzer at salesforce.com
